mapper.select: select o.id, o.total_price, o.create_time,o.finish_time, o.state, o.order_num, o.name, o.address, o.room_num, o.longitude, o.latitude, o.tel, o.user_id, o.shop_id,s.name as shopName, s.latitude as shopLatitude,s.longitude as shopLongitude,s.address as shopAddress from t_order_detail o,t_shop s where o.state='1' and s.id=o.shop_id
mapper.update: update set t_order_detail state=(select value from t_property where type='order_state' and name='已取货'), where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id as shopId,name as title ,address,longitude,latitude from t_shop where state='2'

select o.id, o.total_price, o.create_time,o.finish_time, o.state, o.order_num, o.name, o.address, o.room_num, o.longitude, o.latitude, o.tel, o.user_id, o.shop_id,s.name as shopName, s.latitude as shopLatitude,s.longitude as shopLongitude,s.address as shopAddress from t_order_detail o,t_shop s where (o.state='2' or o.state='3' or o.state='7') and s.id=o.shop_id and o.deliveryman_id=#{deliverymanId}
